text:
San Francisco Bay Area | Full-time | On-site/Remote | Natera, Inc

Natera is building an in-house Ruby on Rails team to work on customer-facing enterprise applications. Bay Area preferred, but not required. Opportunities to work with lots of technologies on a variety of projects in interesting an interesting problem-space: big data, healthcare, HIPAA compliance, security.

Questions, contact: jobs at apsis.io
